evolution can handle multiple accounts
dude, how can i be able to modify the folder but only make it redable for the online users?
adjust yours to be like mine.. > drwxr-xr-x  6 razor www-data 4.0K 2009-01-13 16:55 www
i own it so i can edit it fine.. the group can read and execute.. so can all others.
sudo chown -R myName:www-data mysites
is this ok? drwxr-xr-x 3 myName www-data 4096 2009-11-13 16:19 mysites
does that match what i suggested?
no but i dont knwo the right command, i used :   sudo chown -R mrXX:www-data mysites
that matches exactly like i suggested.
yours has a seven in it
mine has a 3
that 7 is how many files/folders are in the directory.
my bad, thanks dude , gr8 help
any folders in /var/www need this same permission set if you want others to view it.
and the files you host also need that same permission set.
but now i cant see the index page on the browser, it says permission denied!
set the permissions the same as /var/www
i'm actually wrong on files. the files just need read permission for the group.
